com.zpaper.commons

Class FileDeletion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zpaper.commons.FileDeletion

  • public class FileDeletion
extends Object
    This class controls the tracking and deletion of files at specified expiration times.

    This class must be started during the webapp initialization by an entry in the web.xml

    NOTES: CMA160511 - It was a poor design using shared database to track local caching. Refactoring to use local file system. New Design... use a DIDmap type design where paths are stored in timestamp named files. No locking required.

    Cache entries are stored in ${cachePath} with filenames like df-yyyyMMddHHmmssSSS. A separate thread scans the cached directory for these files and deletes the files contained within.

    CMA170420 #36465 Found a problem where the loop causes 100% CPU utilization. CMA171011 Updated from lessons learned in S3Uploader Thread CMA181111 #53444 Added support for config params: file.deletion.queuepath; file.deletion.whitelist; and file.deletion.MinRetentionTimeMs with reasonable defaults. CRN190930 Converted from static class to singleton

    Author:
    C M Ashton
